meta.name: HK-Bus
meta.description: A plugin that supports most of the public transport in Hong Kong, powered by the HKBUS.APP API.

meta.name: AIU
meta.description: 国際教養大学線の時刻表を提供するプラグインです。

meta.name: CUHK
meta.description: A plugin that provides timetable information for the school bus at the Chinese University of Hong Kong (CUHK), data sourced from the CCheukKa/CUHK-bus-clock.
